languages.text: Протоколы дознания поражают избыточностью — фиксируется все, от направления взгляда допрашиваемого до длительности пауз между ответами.
The interrogation transcripts are strikingly redundant: they record everything from the direction of the questioned person's gaze to the length of the pauses between their answers.
languages.original_text: Протоколы дознания поражают избыточностью — фиксируется все, от направления взгляда допрашиваемого до длительности пауз между ответами.

traits.locale_text: The protocols of interrogation are strikingly redundant, they record everything from the direction of the questioned person's gaze to the length of pauses between answers.

The interrogation transcripts are strikingly redundant: they record everything from the direction of the questioned person's gaze to the length of the pauses between their answers.

languages.text: Die Mitschriften der Verhöre sind auffällig redundant. Sie registrieren alles. Von der Blickrichtung der befragten Person bis zu den Pausen zwischen ihren Antworten.
languages.original_text: The interrogation transcripts are strikingly redundant: they record everything from the direction of the questioned person's gaze to the length of the pauses between their answers.

traits.locale_text: Die Mitschriften der Verhöre sind auffällig redundant. Sie registrieren alles. Von der Blickrichtung der befragten Person bis zu den Pausen zwischen ihren Antworten.

languages.text: Les transcriptions des interrogatoires sont étonnamment redondantes : elles enregistrent tout, de la direction du regard de l'interrogé à la longueur des pauses entre ses réponses.
languages.original_text: The interrogation transcripts are strikingly redundant: they record everything from the direction of the questioned person's gaze to the length of the pauses between their answers.

traits.locale_text: Les transcriptions des interrogatoires sont étonnamment redondantes : elles enregistrent tout, de la direction du regard de l'interrogé à la longueur des pauses entre ses réponses.

languages.text: Las transcripciones de los interrogatorios destacan por su redundancia. Registran todo, desde la dirección en la que mira la persona interrogada hasta la duración de las pausas entre sus respuestas.
languages.original_text: The interrogation transcripts are strikingly redundant: they record everything from the direction of the questioned person's gaze to the length of the pauses between their answers.

traits.locale_text: Las transcripciones de los interrogatorios destacan por su redundancia. Registran todo, desde la dirección en la que mira la persona interrogada hasta la duración de las pausas entre sus respuestas.

languages.text: 取り調べ調書は驚くほどに冗長だ。日々者の視線の向きから答えるまでの沈黙の長さまで、あらゆることが記録されている。
languages.original_text: The interrogation transcripts are strikingly redundant: they record everything from the direction of the questioned person's gaze to the length of the pauses between their answers.

traits.locale_text: 取り調べ調書は驚くほどに冗長だ。日々者の視線の向きから答えるまでの沈黙の長さまで、あらゆることが記録されている。

languages.text: 审讯笔录内容冗长得吓人，记录了被问询人方方面面的一切，从目光凝视的方向，到回答之间停顿时间长短，不一而足。
languages.original_text: The interrogation transcripts are strikingly redundant: they record everything from the direction of the questioned person's gaze to the length of the pauses between their answers.

traits.locale_text: 审讯笔录内容冗长得吓人，记录了被问询人方方面面的一切，从目光凝视的方向，到回答之间停顿时间长短，不一而足。

languages.text: Sorgu nüshaları, muazzam derecede lüzumsuz bilgilerle dolu. Sorguya çekilen kişinin baktığı yönden verdiği cevaplar arasındaki duraksamalarına dek her şeyi kayıt altına almışlar.
languages.original_text: The interrogation transcripts are strikingly redundant: they record everything from the direction of the questioned person's gaze to the length of the pauses between their answers.
